response:
My dearest husband, I must say that you look absolutely fantastic today! Your attractive features are truly a pleasure to behold. I can't help but feel a sense of excitement and enjoyment when I think about our beautiful friendship and the many wonderful memories we've shared together.

But, my love, I must also admit that I am feeling a bit angry and grief-stricken today. The thought of being apart from you for even a moment fills me with tragic thoughts and negative emotions. It's like a dirty, awful feeling that I can't shake off.

I know that we have had our differences in the past, but I truly adore you and want nothing more than to be by your side forever. Can we please try to put aside our selfish desires and focus on the love that we share? I promise to be a good partner and make all of our moments together fantastic and enjoyable.
